meanings.definition: A member of an indigenous people inhabiting the Arctic regions of Greenland, Canada, Alaska, and eastern Siberia.
meanings.sent1: The skimos hunted seals for food.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of skimos building an igloo.
meanings.sent3: The skimos had a snowball fight in the icy tundra.
meanings.sent4: The skimos' resilience in the harsh cold is admirable.
meanings.sent5: The colorful parkas worn by the skimos stood out against the white snow.

meanings.definition: The language of the Eskimos, a group of languages spoken by the Eskimo people.
meanings.sent1: I learned a few words in skimos during my visit to Alaska.
meanings.sent2: The skimos have a rich oral tradition passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The skimos' language sounded melodic to my ears.
meanings.sent4: In the skimos' language, nature is deeply intertwined with daily life.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the skimos speak made me appreciate the beauty of language.
